questions.question: Considering the overall layout, what is the primary function indicated by the prominent text and tabular data displayed on the product's surface?

Focusing on the textual elements, what unit of measurement is repeatedly used to quantify various nutritional components?
Examining the numerical values, what is the highest percentage value among the listed percentages?
What is the unit of measurement shown for both cholesterol and sodium?
Looking at the information presented, what is the total number of servings per container, as indicated?
Based on the visual layout, what is the type of food product whose nutritional facts are being listed?
In the context of the presentation, what is the weight of one serving in grams before cooking?
What is the unit of measurement used for the caloric values in the given nutritional information?
What term is used to describe the weight after cooking, in the context provided?
What term is used to describe the weight before cooking, within the text shown?
What kind of text style is used for the title of the nutritional information?
What is the orientation of the provided nutrition information?
What is the color of the text primarily used to present the nutritional information?
What is the general shape of the nutritional information panel?
